types.html:
ne pas s'en laisser conter

  1. to be no sucker, to not be easily taken in, to not let oneself be fooled easily

See also

[edit]
  • ne pas être né de la dernière pluie
trans: to be no sucker, to not be easily taken in, to not let oneself be fooled easily
to be no sucker, to not be easily taken in, to not let oneself be fooled easily
